Solarix KingStar 1KVA Hybrid Off-Grid Pure Sine Wave Inverter (12VDC) - This Inverter is an entry level unit that is designed to get you through the challenges of Load-Shedding on a limited budget and suitable for use with basic low energy appliances such as PCs, TVs, lights, and Wifi routers. It is designed to be ideal for a small home in a town house complex or flats. This Inverter with a 30A PWM Solar Charge Controller also supports the implementation of off-grid Solar photovoltaic panels installations. Overload And Short Circuit Protection. Cold Start Function.
